title: W3Schools
description: W3Schools has many introductory tutorials including Python, NumPy, Pandas and Django.

title: Kaggle
description: Kaggle is a platform for data science and machine learning. It has many datasets and tutorials for all skill levels.

title: Real Python
description: Real Python has many tutorials for learning Python, Data Science, Machine Learning and more. It is great for learning the intricacies of the Python programming language.

title: Hugging Face
description: Hugging Face is a platform for machine learning and artificial intelligence. It has many models and tutorials on topics such as NLP, Computer Vision and Deep Learning.
